title: How to Make Rice With Cashews

steps.headline: Cut the apple and celery into small pieces.
Add oil to the frying pan and place the cut food into it.
Add the three tablespoons of water.
Add the rice.
steps.description: Mix it through and warm it.

steps.headline: Serve.
steps.description: The rice with cashew nuts goes well with a vegetarian curry or other similar food.

text: Chop the onion finely.  Cut the apple and celery into small pieces.  Add oil to the frying pan and place the cut food into it.  Add the three tablespoons of water. Simmer for 10 minutes. Add the rice. Mix it through and warm it. Serve. The rice with cashew nuts goes well with a vegetarian curry or other similar food.
